entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Forestville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
